abstract: Andrew D. Hamingson, the executive director of St. Ann’s Warehouse in Brooklyn, is to be the next president of the Lower Manhattan Cultural Council.

headline.main: Andrew Hamingson to Lead Lower Manhattan Cultural Council
headline.print_headline: New Leader Chosen for Cultural Council

snippet: Andrew D. Hamingson, the executive director of St. Ann’s Warehouse in Brooklyn, is to be the next president of the Lower Manhattan Cultural Council.
